Package edu.bu.pas.pokemon.core

Class Pokemon.PokemonView

java.lang.Object
edu.bu.pas.pokemon.core.Pokemon.PokemonView
Enclosing class:
Pokemon
public static class Pokemon.PokemonView extends Object
A read-only version of a Pokemon. This class gets deep-copy values from a Pokemon. The purpose of this class, like Battle.BattleView and Move.MoveView is to ensure that Agents cannot alter the true state of the game.

      public PokemonView(Pokemon p, Team.TeamView tv)
      A constructor to create this instance from deep-copies values from Pokemon and Team.TeamView instances.
      Parameters:
      p - the Pokemon to get deep-copies of the values from.
      tv - The Team.TeamView intance to set this TeamView's reference to.

    • getAvailableMoves

      public List<Move.MoveView> getAvailableMoves()
      A method to calculate the collection of learnable moves that could be chosen by this pokemon view. If this pokemon view is already locked into a multi-turn move, then the output will only have that value inside it. Otherwise, the subset of learned moves this pokemon view has will be returned, only move view that are not null and have pp values are potential candidates. If this pokemon view has no moves it can use then the move struggle will be added (see StruggleMove).
      Returns:
      the collection of learnable moves that can be chosen. Struggle is added if nothing can be chosen.
